      • canInteractWithGroup

        public boolean canInteractWithGroup​(UserModel user,
                                    GroupModel group)
        Check if the group and the user can interact (false if the group banned the user or the user blocked the group)
        Parameters:
        group - the group that the function is checking
        user - the user that the function is checking
        Returns:
        whether the group and the user can interact

      • joinGroup

        public boolean joinGroup​(UserModel user,
                         GroupModel group)
        Joining a group. If the user cannot interact with the group then return false. Else return true. Still it depends on the setting of the group, the user either get the member role or go into a joinRequestQueue.
        Parameters:
        group - the group the user is trying to join
        user - the user that's trying to join the group
        Returns:
        Whether joining the group was successful or not

      • blockGroup

        public boolean blockGroup​(UserModel user,
                          GroupModel group)
        Block a group. If the group was already blocked then return false.
        Parameters:
        group - the group that is being blocked
        user - the user that's blocking the group
        Returns:
        whether blocking the group was successful or not

      • unblockGroup

        public boolean unblockGroup​(UserModel user,
                            GroupModel group)
        Unblock a group. If the group wasn't blocked then return false.
        Parameters:
        group - the group that is being unblocked
        user - the user that's unblocking the group
        Returns:
        whether unblocking the group was successful or not

      • getPostsInGroup

        public java.util.ArrayList<PostModel> getPostsInGroup​(UserModel user,
                                                      GroupModel group)
        Get all the posts in the group
        Parameters:
        user - the user that's calling this function
        group - the group that the user want to see posts from
        Returns:
        an arrayList of all posts from the group
